Package h2PVisitors

Class Summary
ASTErrorChecker Performs a battery of checks on the semantics of the parsed AST.
aVisitor Abstract visitor class.
CStateFlattenerVisitor Handles the flattening of composite states.
Hil2PromelaVisitor Visitor class to generate the Promela code for each node in the HIL parse tree.
PromelaInPredicateVisitor Uses the Expression Grammar to find "in" predicates in an expression in order to build an INPredicateTarget list for a given model.
PromelaStateVisitor Supports Hil2PromelaVisitor by generating Promela code for composite states.
